caption.p: Long-term average annual changes in seasonal water flows (winter—Q djf, spring—Q mam, summer—Q jja, and fall—Q son) for each socio-economic scenario (BAU, CRI, MH, and SET) shown as boxplots. In gray, without the effect of climate change. In blue for the scenario period (2011–2040) compared with the reference period (1971–2000)
